p.s: And I apologize for being so forward,
but I really wanna Fuck You.
I wanna Fuck you Both. Or All if 3 or more.
It's just seems every girl has a boyfriend or is married, and I have Needs!
Why pick one of you, when I don't even have time for a girlfriend.
N- one gets choosen over or left out,
And I already took Viagra, so it will stay rock hard as long as we want it to.
